QuestionTxt: Do you think Russia's attempts to influence the (2016) presidential election using cyber-attacks helped Donald Trump or helped Hillary Clinton, or do you think they had no real effect? Do you think Russia helped Clinton/Trump a lot or just a little?
StudyNote: 419 respondents were interviewed on a landline telephone, and 592 were interviewed on a cell phone. Interviews were conducted by Braun Research.
